Title: Dashakriya
Writer: Baba Bhand (novel), Sanjay Krishnaji Patil (dialogue), Sanjay Krishnaji Patil (screenplay)
Actors: Aarya Adhav, Nandkishor Chougule, Aditi Deshpande, Vinayak Ghadigaonkar
Plot: While revealing the disturbing reality around the last rites, their commercialization and the emotional exploitation of the bereaved family, Dashakriya focuses on how even the kids get involved in the business due to extreme poverty.
